bibl.title: Ostraka from Hibis in the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Archaeology of the City of Hibis
bibl.note: Introduction. - Hibis under the palm groves. - The excavations at Ain Turba. - Ostraka from Hibis [fourth century]: 1. MMA X.608.1. Wooden tablet; - 2. X.608.2. Order for payment of σιτόκριθον; - 3. X.608.3. Memorandum concerning timber; - 4. X.608.4. Receipt for wheat; - 5. X.608.5. Order to supply barley; - 6. X.608.6. Account of bricks; - 7. X.608.7. Order to supply oil; - 8. X.608.8. Name; - 9. MMA 25.10.25.41. Receipt; - 10. 25.10.25.42. Account (?) of bricks; - 11. 25.10.25.43. Order or receipt; - 12. 25.10.25.44. Account of rent (?); - 13. 25.10.25.45. Uncertain text; - 14. 25.10.25.46. Alphabet; - 15. 25.10.25.47+48. Uncertain text; - 16. 25.10.25.49. Order for delivery; - 17. 25.10.25.50. Receipt (?); - 18. 25.10.25.51. Letter [in Coptic]; - 19. 25.10.25.52. Letter? [in Coptic].
bibl.seg: Roger S. Bagnall & Gaëlle Tallet, Ostraka from Hibis in the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Archaeology of the City of Hibis.
